metadata.name: HAZE - One Morning -
metadata.description:
煙霧に包まれ淡く輝く太陽が昇るとき、少女 迦亜羅(カーラ)は旅にでる。
数多の世界を渡りゆく、彼女の眼に映るものは？

この作品は漫画家の草壁氏（@HAZE_）と
写真家のHiro Morioka（@hiromasamorioka）のコラボレーションNFTです。

作画：草壁（@HAZE_）
背景写真・編集エフェクト：HiroMorioka（@hiromasamorioka）

When the sun rises in a haze of haze, she sets out on a journey.
What are the reflections in her eyes as she crosses through many worlds?

This NFT work is a collaboration between two artists.

It was created by comic artist Kusakabe (@HAZE_) and photographer Hiro Morioka (@hiromasamorioka).

Character drawing: Kusakabe (@HAZE_)
Background photography and editing effects: HiroMorioka (@hiromasamorioka)
